description: OCS Inventory client Agent/Client for the Open Computers and Software Inventory. You will have a complete inventory of all your Android devices: hardware and software information will be collected and stored. Processors, memories, drives and space used, bios, serial number, installed applications and versions, SIM and operator information, â€¦ OCS Inventory Agent for Android send inventory to OCS Inventory NG Server 2.1 OCS Inventory NG project is an open source project providing: * hardware and software inventory (multiplatform) * network discovery (IP Discover and SNMP) * software deployment * interfaced with others IT and Asset Management Software througt the OCS WebService
